title: Richard Hatch Dead - 'Battlestar Galactica' Actor Dies at 71
text:
Battlestar Galactica actor Richard Hatch has sadly passed away at the age of 71.
The actor lost his battle to pancreatic cancer after being admitted into hospice care a few weeks ago, according to TMZ .
Richard got his start in the acting world with a role on the soap opera All My Children back in 1970. Eight years later, he landed his role on Battlestar Galactica and he earned a Golden Globe nomination for his work as Captain Apollo.
When the series was rebooted in 2004, he joined the show as the character Tom Zarek.
